definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: from rain and storm Is 4:6, Is 25:4, Job 24:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: from danger [[סְלָעִים מַחְסֶּה לַשְׁפַנִּים]] rocks a refuge for conies Ps 104:18; [[מחסה כזב]] refuge of falsehood Is 28:17; [[כזב מחסנוּ]] falsehood our refuge Is 28:15; elsewhere of God as the refuge of his people Ps 14:6, Ps 46:2, Ps 61:4, Ps 62:8, Ps 62:9, Ps 71:7, Ps 73:28, Ps 91:2, Ps 91:9, Ps 94:22, Ps 142:6, Pr 14:26, Je 17:17, Joe 4:16.
